revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "Col. i;Traces of the assessment figure, drachmas 45 obols 2, appear at various points along the left margin;;Col. ii;Labeous, son of Psenobastis, drachmas 45 obols 2;;Pachnoubis, son of
